sourceDesc.p:
If Chinese, the text below is based on the Taishō text from the CBETA-Database (Version Feb.2006). If Pāli, the text base is the VRI Chaṭṭa Saṅgāyana edition (ver.3). If Sanskrit the text base is Enomoto, Fumio 榎本文雄 (1994): A comprehensive study of the Chinese Saṃyuktāgama: Indic texts corresponding to the Chinese Saṃyuktāgama as found in the Sarvāstivāda-Mūlasarvāstivāda literature. projectDesc.p: This file has been created in the project "A Digital Comparative Edition of the Bieyi za ahan jing" conducted at the Chung-hwa Institute for Buddhist Studies 中華佛學研究所 and the Dharma Drum Buddhist College 法鼓佛教研修學院. The project was funded by the Chiang Ching-kuo Foundation for International Scholarly Exchange 蔣經國國際學術交流基金會. The aim of the project was to produce a comparative digital edition and partial translation of the 364 sutras of the BZA and their parallels. In the original interface, the texts were kept in an eXist database and are realized via XQuery and XSLT as HTML for the online user. The project lasted from 2005-2009.

div.head: ma hā sam ya sū tra
'dus pa chen po'i mdo
div.p: From the Derge edition. Derge 034. This is part of the text-cluster of BZA (T.100) sutra 105.

'dus pa chen po'i mdo/ 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shākya'i yul ser skya'i gzhi'i tshal chen po na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po lnga brgya ste/ de thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs so//

'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i lha rnams de mthag tu 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams blta ba'i phyir ro/ de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i ris bzhi po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/

'dir yang bcom ldan 'das kyis shākya'i yul ser skya'i gzhi'i tshal chen po na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po lnga brgya ste/ de thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs so/ 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i lha rnams de ma thag tu 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams blta ba'i phyir ro/ gang dag de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der de dag song ste song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa so sor brjod par bya'o/

de nas lha de rnams kyis 'di lha ste skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las/ brkyang ba tsam dang brkyang ba las bskum pa de bzhin du gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams mi snang bar gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang bar gyur to/ de nas lha de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas yang lha de nams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams gsol to/

lg.l: 'dus pa chen po'i tshal 'di ru/ lha yi tshogs rnams 'dus pa ste/
chos 'di'i phyir du bdag 'ongs pa/ dge 'dun mi pham 'dus pa blta/

div.p: de nas lha gshan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to/

lg.l: dge 'dun sems rnams dul ba dang/ rang gi sems ni drang por byas/
kha lo sgyur bas drang por 'dzin/ de bzhin mkhas pas dbang po bsrung/

div.p: de nas lha gzhan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to/

lg.l: khyim gyi 'ching ba bton pa dang/ dbang po nas ni sems 'gro zhing/
dag cing dri med der 'gro ba/ mig ldan glang po dul ba gzhin/

div.p: de nas lha gzhan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to/

lg.l: gang zhigs sangs rgyas skyabs 'gro ba/ de ni ngan song 'gro mi 'gyur/
mi yi lus ni spangs nas su/ lha yi lus ni yongs rdzogs 'gyur/

div.p: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams bos te de ma thag tu dge slong dag 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i lha rnams 'dus te de bzhin shegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa blta ba'i phyir ro/ dge slong gang de rnams su gyur pa 'das pa'i dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams bcom ldan 'das de tsam du gyur pa de bzhin du lha rnams 'dus par gyur to/ 'di lha ste/ bdag kyang 'di skyad ces smra ste/ dge slong dag lha'i tshogs rnams kyi ming brjod par bya ste/ dge slong dag rab tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i lha'i tshogs dang/ dge slong dag lha'i tshogs ston par byed pa zhes bya ba'o/

lg.l: de thos nas legs par yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad par bya 'o/
de ltar btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la dge slong de rnams kyis so sor zhus nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/
tshigs su bcad pa so sor bshad/ gang dus gzhi mthong gyur na/
ri yi phug tu gang gnas pa/ de ru mnyam par 'jog par byed/
sa gzhir seng ge 'jigs med bzhin/ ba spu tsam yang gyo ba med/
sems ni dag cing dkar ba dang/ chu ni rab tu dangs bzhing du/
lna brgya po yis legs shes shing/ ser skya'i tshal gyi gnas mang po/
de nas dge slong ston pas bos/ bstan la dga' ba'i nyan thos rnams/
lha yi tshogs rnams 'ongs nas ni/ dge slong rnams kyis de shes bya/
lus ni gdung bar byed par/ sangs rgyas bstan pa thos pas so/
de rnams ye shes snang bar 'gyur/ mi ma yin rnams mthong 'gyur ba/
gang zhig gis ni brgya mthob zhing/ stong dang bdun cu mthong ba yin/
brgya dang stong phrag gcig dang ni/ mi ma yin rnams mthong bar 'gyur/
gang zhig gis ni mtha' med mthong/ phyogs kun gang bar 'gyur ba mthong/
de rnams kyis ni rtogs pa dang/ spyan ldan rnam par dpyad nas ni/
de phyir ston pa yis ni bos/ bstan la dga' ba'i nyan thos kyis/
lha yi tshogs rnams 'ons nas ni/ dge slong rnams kyis de shes bya/
gang zhig la ni bdag bshad bya/ go rims bzhin du mnyan par gyis/
stong phrag bdun gyi gnod sbyin rnams/ ser skya'i sa la gnas pa ni/
rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/
chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/
stong phyag drug ni gans can gyi/ gnod sbyin kha dog sna tshogs lus/
rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/
chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/
sna tshogs bshas gnyen lna brgy po/ gnod sbyin kh dog sna tshogs lus/

div.p: nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang/ byang phyogs ni lus ngan po/ de rnams rgyal po chen po bzhi/ 522 phyogs rnams bzhi po kun du'o/ gzi brjid 'bar bsal 'khod nas ni/ ser skya'i gzhi yi tshal du'o/ de rnams sgyu ma rtsed mo bsam/ drung ldan rnams ni nam mkhar la khod/ sgyur ma sku ṭe ṇy baiḍ ṇu/ biry tstsha bairya ḍo bcas/ tsan da na dang 'dod mchog dang/ mgul pa mdzes dang mgul nges dang/ skyed dgu'i blamr gyur dang/ lha las byung ba'i kha lo pa/ dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/ mi rgyal rgyal ba'i khyu mchog dang/ mdun du rtse mo lddad de bzhin/ gyer ma dang ni nyi zer dang/ de dang gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams/ rgyal po dri za dang bcas dang/ chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs nas/ zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ de nas gzhan yang nam mkha'i klu/ yangs pa can du lhan cig gnas/ la brta yi mchog dang ni/ rab 'gro gnyen dang lhan cig pa/ ya mun dang yul 'khor skyang/ klu yi spun dang drags ldan dang/ sa srung glang po chen po rnams/ de yang nags kyi tshal pu'o/ gang zhig klu rgyal myul du len/ lha dang byad rnam dag mi ba/ nam mkha' las 'ongs tshal der sleb/ sna tshogs 'dab bzangs ces de'i ming/ 'jigs med byin pas sklu yi rgyal/ mkha' lding bzod pa rtogs pas so/ phan tshun du ni mi rtsong cing/ klu khyung sangs rgyas skyabs 'gro ba/ rdo rje lag gis rgyal ba dang/ lha ma yin ni rgya mtshor gnas/ spun rnams de yi gnas dang ni/ gzi brjid ldan zhing grags dang ldan/ nag po mig sman 'jigs byed ldan/ lha ma yin rnams khro byed dang/ thags bzangs dang ni thags bzangs ris/ mtshan 'joms na mo ci dang bcas/ stobs kyi bu ni brgyad po rnams/ thams cad rnam par snang mdzad ming/ stobs kyi sde ni go bgos pa/ sgra gcan bzang po sngon du 'gro/ btsun pa de ni 'dus nas ni/ zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ chu dang lha dang sa dang ni/ me dang rlung yang der 'ongs so/ chu lha chu yi lha dang ni/ zla ba dang ni grags par lda/ byams dang snying rje'i tshogs can dang/ lha ni grags ldan mdun du'o/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs rnams ni/ thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/ rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ khyab 'jug lha dang lhan cig tu/ tha dad tha dad 'ongs pa dang/ zla ba de yi 'khor gyi lha/ zla ba'i mdun byas/ 'khor dang ni/ nyi ma'i 'khor gyi lha rnams dang/ nyi ma mdun byas 'khor dang ni/ rgyu skar de yi 'khor dang yang/ mdun byas pa la ha ka dang/ sa dang sa yi gtso bo dang/ brgya byin yang yang sbyin pa dang/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs rnms dang thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/ rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ de nas nyer sbyod lha dang ni/ chu dang me yi rtse mo bzhin/ srga ldan snang bar byed pa dang/ u ma'i me tog de bzhin du/ chu lha dang bcas chos dang ni/ a tstshu ta dang du ma rnams/ bzang len mdzes pa'i mdun dang ni/ mdun dang gnas dang du ma dang/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs dang ni/ thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/ rtsu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ chos gtam bya phyir 'di 'ongs te/ zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ 'dus dang 'dus pa chen po ni/ mi dang mi yi mchog dang ni/ rol pa'i go 'phang mdun du dang/ yid mchog dang ni go 'phang rtse/ de nas lha yi mchod 'os dang/ gang yang dmar po'i gos gyon dang/ pha rol pha rol son chen dang/ grags chen lha yi mdun gnas dang/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs dang ni/ thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/ rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ chos gdam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ dkar dang drod dang dmar po dang/ sngon shugs stug po lhan cig dang/ dkar po 'dzin pa la sogs dang/ mkhas pa'i lha ni sngon du'o/ rtag tu glang chen myos 'phrang ba/ 'dres ba grags dang ldan pa dang/ pradzdzun mang po mdun du dang/ gang zhig phyogs ni mdzes pa dang/ phyogs bcu'i 'jug rten tshogs rnams dang/ thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/ rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ kha dog dang ni grags pa ldan/ chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ dge ba dga' ldan 'tha bral dang/ grags ldan shing dang ldan pa dang/ 'phyang ba gnas dang gtso bo dang/ 'od dang bsam pa zhes bya dang/ 'phrul dga' ba ni sngon du dang/ de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed sngon/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs dang ni/ thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/ rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs nas/ zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ sna tshogs drug po'i sde pa ni/ thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/ ming ni grags dang ldan sngon/ kang gzhan 'dra pa lhan cig tu/ ma lus rigs ni brjod pa 'jig rten stong du ni/ tshangs pa chen po nye bar 'khod/ 'od dang ldan par skye ba dang/ grags ldan sna tshogs lus dang ni/ dang phyug bcu po sngon du dang/ so sor dbang du gyur pa dang/ de yi dbus dang sngon du dang/ 'phrogm 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ de rnams thams cad 'ongs gyur nas/ dbang po lha dang tshangs bcas 'ongs/ bdung kyi sde rnams 'ongs nas ni/ goo tam ste la gnod mi nus/ lag pa thal mo rtebs pa dang/ 'jigs par byed pa'i cho nge sgrogs/ ji ltar llung gis sprin rnams dang/ mun nag glog dang bcas ni/ de ma thag du 'jugs dang bral/ bsam pa khro ba med par gnas/ lha de rnams tham cad dang tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ bdud kyi sde de rnams kyang cang mi smra ba'i tshul gyis songs ngo/ ston pas nyan thos bstan pa la dga' rnams bos te/ de yang 'jigs pa med byed dang/ dag pa'i sangs rgyas bstan pa la/ 'jigs med 'dod chags bral ba ni/ de yi spu'ong glo ba med/ gyul ni kun las rgyal ba dang/ 'jigs pa 'das shing grags par ldan/ lha dang lhan cig brjod pa dang/ nyan thos rnams ni der gnas so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stshal pa dang/ dge slong de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ 'dus pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs sho//
